1.subject: Loved your recent work for [Brand]
1.body: Hi [Name], I just saw your recent work for [Brand], and I was blown away by how seamless the transitions were, especially [specific detail about their work]. It’s clear how much thought you put into the storytelling. I’m [Your Name], a [Your Role, e.g., motion designer/animator], and I specialize in [specific skills, e.g., creating dynamic animations that engage audiences]. I’d love to help you bring similar ideas to life. If you’re looking for an extra hand on your next project, I’d be thrilled to collaborate. Would you be open to chatting? Best, [Your Name]

2.subject: [Name], an idea for your next campaign
2.body: Hi [Name], Your campaign for [Brand/Project] really stood out to me, especially how you [specific element they did, e.g., used bold typography to communicate your message]. It was so impactful! I’m [Your Name], and I specialize in [your specialty, e.g., creating visually striking animations and design concepts]. I had an idea for your next campaign that could [add value, e.g., increase engagement on social media or visually enhance storytelling]. If you’re interested, I’d be happy to share more thoughts. Let me know if you’re free to chat! Cheers, [Your Name]

3.subject: [Name], I’d love to collaborate on your next project
3.body: Hi [Name], I’ve been following your work for a while, and your recent project with [specific project/brand] was exceptional. The [specific element] really elevated the message. My expertise is in [your expertise, e.g., creating eye-catching motion graphics that amplify brand messages]. Let me know if you’re currently looking for collaborators. I’d love to help bring your vision to life! Best regards, [Your Name]
